help.form: Please fill the form in the default language:
help.process_name: Write the name of the process
help.generated_docs: If the process generates a document, choose its type from the list below. If there is no matching type, choose 'other'. If the process does not generate a document, leave this space empty
help.user_tags: Select the user types for which this process is relevant. You can leave this space empty
help.topic_tags: Select the topics related to this process. You can leave this space empty
help.step_name: Choose a name for the step
help.step_location: If the step has a specific location where it must be completed, write it here. You can leave this space empty
help.step_cost: Write here how much it will cost to execute this step
help.required_documents: If the completion of the step requires one or more documents, you can add them via this button. You will then be able to select the type of document and its cost
help.issuer: Write the name of the document type issuer
help.validable: If the document type can be or needs to be validated, check this box
help.validators: Select who can validate this document type from the list
help.doc_type_icon: Select an icon for the document type
help.doc_pics: If there are pictures of the document type, you can upload them here
help.upload_model: If there is a .pdf or .doc model of the document type, you can upload it here
help.user_type: Write the name of the user type
help.user_type_icon: Upload an icon for the user type
help.topic: Write the name of the topic
help.topic_icon: Upload an icon for the topic
help.intervention_type: Write the name of the intervention type
help.intervention_category_type: Select a category for the intervention type
help.integration_type_validators: Select who can validate this intervention type
help.intervention_category: Write the name of the intervention category
help.intervention_title: Write a title for the intervention
help.intervention_assigned_type: Select the type of this intervention
help.intervention_plan_title: Write a title for the intervention plan
help.is_published: Switching the toggle to the right(green) will publish the content as soon as it's saved. Leaving it on the left(white) will save the content and leave it unpublished
help.word_count: Number of words in the description
help.location_maps: Click here to preview the search results of this location on Google Maps
help.location: Write the location of the event
help.pa_username: Write the username that the user will use to login
help.pa_password: Write the password that the user will use to login
help.pa_name: Write the name of the user
help.pa_surname: Write the surname of the user
help.pa_external_id: Write, if avalaible, the external ID of the user
help.pa_admin: Choose if this account will have admin powers
help.pa_mig_tenant: Choose if this account will be a migrant tenant

error_messages.title_empty: Title is empty. Please add a title.
error_messages.fill_default_language: Please fill the default language title:
error_messages.in_translation: This content is waiting translation. The edited content will not be saved.
error_messages.change_translated: To edit the content, switch the translation state to Editing. If the content is change to Editing and saved, the current translations will be deleted.
error_messages.date_time_empty: Please fill the start and end dates and times.

warning.topic: Warning: Deleting a topic will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.user_type: Warning: Deleting an user type will also delete it from the existing guided processes. Proceed?
warning.intervention_type: Warning: Deleting an intervention type will also delete all the interventions of the same tipe. Proceed?
